artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Artist: after Augustus Charles Pugin; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers unbound with two hand-colored engravings of people in fashionable period dress and one hand-colored engraving of a carriage (P.15,217, P.15,218, P.15,218.1)
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Vingt-septième Cahier, 10 Août 1787
